com.advantage.framework

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.advantage.framework.Conversion

  • public class Conversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for conversion functions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Conversion() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String addDays(java.util.Date workingDate, int nAmount, java.lang.String sOutputFormat)
      Adds/Subtracts specified days to the given Date and returns result as a String formatted as specified

      Notes:
      1) Use the method toDate to convert a String if necessary
      2) Can be used to convert a date object to a specific string format

      Examples:
      1) addDays(new Date(), 1, "MM-dd-yyyy") => Tomorrow in format MM-dd-yyyy
      2) addDays(toDate("2012-09-11","yyyy-MM-dd") , 1, "MM-dd-yyyy") => "09-12-2012"
      3) addDays(new Date(), 0, "MM-dd-yyyy") => Today in format MM-dd-yyyy
      4) addDays(toDate("2012-09-11","yyyy-MM-dd") , 0, "MM-dd-yyyy") => "09-11-2012"

      • addDays

        public static java.lang.String addDays(java.util.Date workingDate,
                       int nAmount,
                       java.lang.String sOutputFormat)
        Adds/Subtracts specified days to the given Date and returns result as a String formatted as specified

        Notes:
        1) Use the method toDate to convert a String if necessary
        2) Can be used to convert a date object to a specific string format

        Examples:
        1) addDays(new Date(), 1, "MM-dd-yyyy") => Tomorrow in format MM-dd-yyyy
        2) addDays(toDate("2012-09-11","yyyy-MM-dd") , 1, "MM-dd-yyyy") => "09-12-2012"
        3) addDays(new Date(), 0, "MM-dd-yyyy") => Today in format MM-dd-yyyy
        4) addDays(toDate("2012-09-11","yyyy-MM-dd") , 0, "MM-dd-yyyy") => "09-11-2012"
        Parameters:
        workingDate - - Date object to add/subtract days to
        nAmount - - days to add (positive) /subtract (negative)
        sOutputFormat - - Format to convert to (ex. "yyyy-MM-dd")
        Returns:
        null if exception else String formated based on Date object

      • parseFloat

        public static float parseFloat(java.lang.String sValue)
        Returns the string as a float.

        Note: Float.valueOf("-1") is returned for strings that cannot be converted.
        Parameters:
        sValue - - String to convert
        Returns:
        Float.valueOf("-1") if string cannot be converted else float value

                     int iNumberOfDecimals)

        Parameters:

        iNumberOfDecimals - - Number of decimal places to keep after rounding up.
        Returns:
        - double

      • roundToDecimals

        public static java.lang.String roundToDecimals(java.lang.String sValue,
                               int iNumberOfDecimals)
        Method rounds a given fractional number in String format to specified number of decimals and again returns that rounded number as a String.
        Parameters:
        sValue - - Fractional number in String format.
        iNumberOfDecimals - - Number of decimal places to keep after rounding up.
        Returns:
        - String - If sValue is null or "", then returns "".
